The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Wednesday 

Vegan Soup with Pleurotus Mushrooms – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml  (pleurotus mushroom, cashew, lemon, garlic, apple vinegare, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Couscous with Vegetables & Almonds – vegan / with gluten / paper bio container / 300 g (cous cous, tomato, red bell pepper, onion, vinegar, raisin, egplant, almond, parsley, natural condiments, himalayan salt) or gluten free option MILLET

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Onion & Olive Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 50 g (white onion, millet, black olive, hemp seed, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Coffee and Rom Cake- raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashew, almonds, cocoa butter, coffee, natural rum, tahina, fresh cocoa powder, mesquite, guarana, unfiltered honey)
